mapper.delete: delete from tbl_user_role where user_id = #{userId} and role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.select: select id, name from tbl_role where id in (select role_id from tbl_user_role where user_id = #{userId}) order by id asc
select name from tbl_user_role ur join tbl_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where ur.user_id = #{userId};
